articles.author: Zach Wichter, Nathan Diller
articles.title: See the next solar eclipse: Travel advice for the 2026 European travel - USA TODAY
articles.description: What you need to know if you're planning to travel to Europe for the 2026 solar eclipse.
articles.content:
Umbraphiles feeling the post-eclipse blues should start checking the expiration date on their passports.
The next total solar eclipse is set to happen on Aug. 12, 2026 over Greenland, Iceland, Spain… [+2956 chars]
